newsitem.title: USA: Wall Street stocks open mostly lower.
newsitem.headline: Wall Street stocks open mostly lower.

text.p: U.S. stocks succumbed to mild profit-taking at the opening on Wednesday, pressured also by softer bonds.
The Dow Industrials index was off nine at 5,712 in early trading. The NASDAQ Index was off three at 1,122, while the S&P Index was off one at 665
The 30-year U.S. Treasury bond was down 12/32 to yield 6.83 percent.
